title: 109: Divergence, Convergence, and Wisdom
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: In this episode, Thomas reads from "A Guide for the Perplexed." We discuss how seemingly contradictory viewpoints are sometimes not so contradictory.
itunes:author: Divvy, Civvy, and Wivvy
itunes:subtitle: Trust me, they make sense together.
